Tintri - tintri.com | Mountain View | Full-time, onsite preferred

Tintri is leading the charge for VM-aware storage and currently hiring across the domains, including filesystems, kernel, platform (linux/x86), and more (virtualization/UI/UX/etc). I'm more familiar with filesystems and platform teams, which are very dynamic and close-knit but ping me to apply or know more about other teams as well. We are looking for freshly minted to senior-level engineers, with zeal for technology in general.

Apply here http://www.tintri.com/careers or ping me (ntrivedi @ tintri).
